Labels.Value: "Base container for Watir/Capybara tests against a local Chrome"

CmdLine: set -ex     && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add -     && sh -c 'echo "deb http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main"         >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list'     && apt-get update     && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable libnss3 libgconf-2-4         xvfb unzip libav-tools     && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: set -ex     && cd /tmp     && wget -Nv http://chromedriver.storage.googleapis.com/2.27/chromedriver_linux64.zip     && unzip chromedriver_linux64.zip     && chmod -v +x chromedriver     && mv -v chromedriver /usr/local/bin/     && rm -v chromedriver_linux64.zip
Commands.Name: run
